description.text: You can attack with your armor spikes while using bull rush or overrun.

sections.Benefit: When you succeed at a bull rush or overrun combat maneuver, you may automatically make an attack roll with your armor spikes against the target of the maneuver as a swift action, using your highest attack bonus.
sections.Note: Note If using the optional Stamina Pool rules, the following trick may be used with this feat.
